casebody.data:
QUALITY BUILT HOMES INCORPORATED, et al.
v.
TOWN OF CARTHAGE 315PA15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 6, 2017 James E. Scarbrough, James R. DeMay, Attorneys at Law, Concord, John F. Scarborough, Madeline Trilling, Attorneys at Law, for Quality Built Homes Incorporated, et al. Susan K. Burkhart, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Town of Carthage. Stephen D. Feldman, Paul M. Cox, Attorneys at Law, Raleigh, Steven A. Scoggan, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, F. Paul Calamita, III, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Water Quality Association and Seven Municipalities. J. Daniel Bishop, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Joseph W. Moss, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Union County.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of September 2017 by Plaintiffs for Leave to File Reply to Amicus Curiae Brief of Union County:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of September 2017."
